issue.title: Complete network outage in building
issue.description: Entire office has no network connectivity. Cannot access any systems. Internet down. Phone system down. Affecting 45 staff members. All work stopped.
issue.technical_details: All workstations show 'No Internet Access'. Cannot ping gateway (192.168.10.1). Switch status LEDs show amber on multiple ports. Main fiber link light is red. Possible ISP issue or switch failure.

resolution.notes: Major switch failure. Core switch replaced. All services restored. Some packet loss during transition. ISP confirmed no issues on their end.
